skills.name: Create Cycle
skills.pattern: npm create cycle-app my-app

skills.name: Install Cycle
skills.pattern: npm install @cycle/run @cycle/dom xstream

skills.name: run()
skills.pattern: import { run } from '@cycle/run'; import { makeDOMDriver } from '@cycle/dom'; run(main, { DOM: makeDOMDriver('#app') })

skills.name: Main Function
skills.pattern: function main(sources) { const vdom$ = ...; return { DOM: vdom$ } }

skills.name: Sources
skills.pattern: function main(sources) { const click$ = sources.DOM.select('button').events('click'); ... }

skills.name: Sinks
skills.pattern: return { DOM: vdom$, HTTP: request$ } // sinks to drivers

skills.name: xstream
skills.pattern: import xs from 'xstream'; const count$ = xs.periodic(1000).map(i => i + 1)

skills.name: map
skills.pattern: const doubled$ = count$.map(x => x * 2)

skills.name: filter
skills.pattern: const even$ = count$.filter(x => x % 2 === 0)

skills.name: fold
skills.pattern: const sum$ = numbers$.fold((acc, x) => acc + x, 0)

skills.name: merge
skills.pattern: const events$ = xs.merge(click$, keypress$)

skills.name: combine
skills.pattern: const combined$ = xs.combine(a$, b$).map(([a, b]) => a + b)

skills.name: DOM Driver
skills.pattern: makeDOMDriver('#app') // renders vdom$, provides DOM source

skills.name: select()
skills.pattern: sources.DOM.select('.btn').events('click')

skills.name: events()
skills.pattern: sources.DOM.select('input').events('input').map(e => e.target.value)

skills.name: Snabbdom
skills.pattern: import { div, button, p } from '@cycle/dom'; div([button('Click'), p('Hello')])

skills.name: JSX
skills.pattern:
import { jsx } from '@cycle/dom'; const vdom$ = state$.map(s =>
{s.count}
)

skills.name: Attributes
skills.pattern: div({ attrs: { class: 'container', id: 'main' } }, [...])

skills.name: Props
skills.pattern: input({ props: { value: state.text, type: 'text' } })

skills.name: Style
skills.pattern: div({ style: { color: 'red', fontSize: '14px' } })

skills.name: HTTP Driver
skills.pattern: import { makeHTTPDriver } from '@cycle/http'; run(main, { DOM: ..., HTTP: makeHTTPDriver() })

skills.name: Request
skills.pattern: const request$ = xs.of({ url: '/api/data', category: 'data' }); return { HTTP: request$ }

skills.name: Response
skills.pattern: const response$ = sources.HTTP.select('data').flatten().map(res => res.body)

skills.name: isolate()
skills.pattern: import { isolate } from '@cycle/isolate'; const IsolatedComp = isolate(Component)

skills.name: Scoped Selectors
skills.pattern: isolate(Component, { DOM: '.my-scope' })

skills.name: Component Pattern
skills.pattern: function Counter(sources) { const vdom$ = ...; return { DOM: vdom$, value: count$ } }

skills.name: Component Composition
skills.pattern: const childSinks = Child(sources); const parentVdom$ = childSinks.DOM.map(childVdom => div([childVdom]))

skills.name: State Management
skills.pattern: import { withState } from '@cycle/state'; run(withState(main), drivers)

skills.name: Reducer
skills.pattern: const reducer$ = action$.map(action => state => ({ ...state, count: state.count + 1 }))

skills.name: MVI Pattern
skills.pattern: Model (state logic), View (vdom), Intent (user actions) - functional reactive architecture
